Title: Repeals subdivision (jj) of section 1115 of the tax law and subdivision 13 of section 1118 of the tax law relating to sales and compensating use taxes imposed with respect to vessels
Summary: Relates to sales and compensating use taxes imposed with respect to vessels.
LawCode: Rpld ยง1115 sub (jj), ยง1118 sub 13, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal subdivision (jj) of section 1115 of the tax law relating to sales and compensating use taxes imposed with respect to vessels; and to repeal subdivision 13 of section 1118 of the tax law relating to sales and compensating use taxes imposed with respect to vessels
